testcase.purpose: Check if MediaServerManager interface exists
Check if scanNetwork exist in MediaServerManager
Check if the method of scanNetwork is valid
Check if onserverfound exists in MediaServerManager
Check if onserverlost exists in MediaServerManager
Check if the Navigator has mediaServer attribute with proper type, object and readonly
Check if MediaServer.id exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.friendlyName exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.manufacturer exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.manufacturerURL exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.modelDescription exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.modelName exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.modelNumber exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.serialNumber exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.UDN exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.presentationURL exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.iconURL exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.deviceType exists, readonly and type is DOMString
Check if MediaServer.root exists, readonly and type is object
Check if MediaServer.canUpload exists, readonly and type is boolean
Check if MediaServer.canCreateContainer exists, readonly and type is boolean
Check if MediaServer.searchAttrs exists, readonly and type is object
Check if MediaServer.sortAttrs exists, readonly and type is object
Check if upload method exists in MediaServer and type is function
Check if createFolder method exists in MediaServer and type is function
Check if browse method exists in MediaServer and type is function
Check if find method exists in MediaServer and type is function
Check if cancel method exists in MediaServer and type is function
Check if oncontainerchanged event exists in MediaServer and type is event
Check if the MediaServer.friendlyName value is user-friendly name for the device
Check if the MediaServer.manufacturer value is a string identifying the manufacturer of the server
Check if the MediaServer.manufacturerURL value is a URL pointing to the manufacturer web site
Check if the MediaServer.modelName value is model name of the server
Check if the MediaServer.modelNumber value is the server's version number
Check if the MediaServer.serialNumber value is the server's serial number
Check if the MediaServer.iconURL value is the URL pointing to an icon that graphically identifies the server
Check if the MediaServer.deviceType value is the UPnP type of the device
Check if MediaContainer.childCount exists, readonly and type is number
Check if MediaContainer.canCreateContainer exists, readonly and type is boolean
Check if MediaContainer.canDelete exists, readonly and type is boolean
Check if MediaContainer.canUpload exists, readonly and type is boolean
Check if MediaContainer.canRename exists, readonly and type is boolean
Check if upload method exists in MediaContainer and type is function
Check if createFolder method exists in MediaContainer and type is function
Check if the MediaContainer.childCount will return the number of child media items and containers
Check if the MediaServer.cancel method work well
Check if the MediaServer.createFolder method can work well
Check if the MediaServer.browse method can work well
Check if the MediaServer.find method can work well
Check if the MediaServer.upload method can work well
Check if the oncontainerchanged event can be invoked
Check if the MediaServer.canCreateContainer value is true if a container can be created on this server
Check if the MediaServer.canUpload value is true if an item can be uploaded on this server
Check if the MediaContainer.canCreateContainer is true if a container can be created in this container
Check if the MediaContainer.canDelete is true if an item can be deleted in this container
Check if the MediaContainer.canRename is true if an item can be renamed in this container
Check if the MediaContainer.canUpload is true if an item can be uploaded in this container
Check if the MediaContainer.upload method can work well
Check if the MediaContainer.createFolder method can work well
Check if the onserverfound event can be invoked
Check if the onserverlost event can be invoked
Check if the id attribute exists in MediaServerIdEvent
Check if the MediaServerIdEvent.id MUST return the id of the MediaServer that triggered the onserverlost event when getting
Check if the id attribute exists in MediaContainerIdEvent
Check if the MediaContainerIdEvent.id MUST return the id of the MediaContainer that triggered the containerchanged event when getting
Check if the value of MediaServer attributes
Check if the MediaServerEvent.server exists, readonly and type is object
Check if scanNetwork exist in MediaServerManager.
Check if MediaServerManager exist in window.
Check if mediaServer exists in tizen.
Check if MediaServer has id attribute with proper type, not null, readonly.
Check if MediaServer has friendlyName attribute with proper type, not null, readonly.
Check if MediaServer has root attribute with proper type, not null, readonly.
Check if browse method exists in MediaServer.
Check if find method exists in MediaServer.
